commenter_b: There are a couple of million people in prisons and jail right now (Google it). I'm pretty sure they were taken there and didn't voluntarily have themselves incarcerated. Don't say it's impossible. That said, I think it's improbable and impractical to plan on finding 12 million illegal immigrants as a whole and deport them. Just let them remain illegal and deport them as you find them. Let them stand in line with everybody else who is attempting to immigrate LEGALLY.
